title: All Directions
lyrics:
This heart is for the wrecking
But leave it up to me
This heart is for the wrecking
But leave it up to me, leave it up to me
These arms won't last forever

So, I can't promise you we will, can't promise you we will

These arms won't last forever

So, I can't promise you we will, I can't promise you



Weren't we beautiful once?

Weren't we beautiful once?

Weren't we beautiful once?

Weren't we beautiful once?

And weren't we the beautiful ones?

I promise we were, I promise we were



Weren't we beautiful once?

Weren't we beautiful once?

Weren't we beautiful once?

Weren't we beautiful once?

For all we see in all directions

For all we see in all directions

For all we see in all directions

Weren't we beautiful once?

For all we see in all directions

Weren't we beautiful once?
